page.title: 01 Our Square
page.content: The places we saw were very near Milton Keynes.We looked at some farm crops and some housing estates which fringed part of our block. There were cattle and sheep grazing on some of the land that we saw. The Buckingham Road runs through our squares, it acts as a link to the city of Milton Keynes from the outlying villages. It is a pleasant, quiet area although it has a busy road running through it.While we were looking around the area we saw fields of barley, wheat,corn and grazing land. In fact in Weazel Lane there were the remains of last years crop ,which was barley and alongside it this years crop of corn. J.Chamberlain,M. Erwin Aged 12 yrs.
